name: indicator.email
description: A status light for your email

scripts.postdeploy: heroku run mkdir /tmp/gems/; export GEM_HOME='/tmp/gems'; gem install iron_worker_ng; cd helpers/iron_worker; /tmp/gems/bin/iron_worker upload poll

GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID.description: Your Google App's Client ID. You will need to create a Google Application with OAuth Credentials. https://console.developers.google.com/

GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET.description: The Client Secret from your Google App.

GOOGLE_REDIRECT_URL.description: The redirect URI Google is expecting. This should be to your app.

API_CLIENT_ID.description: An ID to be used as an API User

API_CLIENT_SECRET.description: A key to be used as an API key.

INDICATOR_CACHE_TIME.description: The time clients should cache indicators.
